ygData.subject: Re: Archery
ygData.msgSnippet: -As a warrior, I planned the use of archery as a pulling tool. I didn t expect to do much damage with the bow. I just figured on fletching and making bows and
ygData.messageBody:
-As a warrior, I planned the use of archery as a pulling tool. I
didn't expect to do much damage with the bow. I just figured on
fletching and making bows and learning how to use the skill to it's
best as I learned the game from a warrior's perspective.

The site by the name "Fletching Guide by Aoenla" has some nice info.
You might look there. And "EQ Traders Corner" has good stuff as well.

I am rather new to fletching, so as I learn more I will try to share.

Bartoo
Halfling Warrior
Zeb Server

-- In EverQuest@y..., "Richard Skelton" <richards@h...> wrote:
> Hi there!
>
> Are there any high level Rangers on this list that could tell me a
little about Archery please? I created a Woodelf Ranger yesterday
and planned to focus on this skill, but a friend has just told me
that Archery is broken and serves no purpose but to pull albeit from
great distances. I was hoping that a well developed archer, along
with snare could do most damage to mobs before its arrival. If this
not true I find it staggering. Its fine for casters to snare, DD and
DoT - ie fighting from a distance, but not bow-wielders?
> Any advice and general observations would be kindly met
>
> Thanks
>
> Legless, 8 Ranger
>
> Aka Rykk Bloodfang, 52 Monk
>
>
>
